7. 4:30 PM to 5:30 PM: Review the day's work and plan for tomorrow's activities. Update any necessary documents or plans.
8. 5:30 PM to 7:00 PM: Evening personal time (exercise, relaxation, family time).
9. 7:00 PM to 9:00 PM: Dinner and catch up on social media or news.
10. 9:00 PM to 10:30 PM: Prepare for bedtime, read or watch something relaxing before turning in.
11. 10:30 PM to 7:00 AM: Sleep and rest for the next day.
